alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 03 at 10:08AM CST until January 03 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 AM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN CHOCTAW...WEBSTER AND CENTRAL MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 1008 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Kilmichael, or 7 miles east of Winona, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Lodi around 1020 AM CST. Eupora, Bellefontaine and Embry around 1040 AM CST. Mathiston around 1050 AM CST. Clarkson around 1055 AM CST. Cumberland around 1100 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mantee and Walthall. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for north central Mississippi. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 500 PM CST for central and northeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
